amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in House Report 114-683 to strike section 431.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike section 431 pertaining to GHG NSPS of the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 244 (Roll no. 431).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 244 (Roll no. 431).
